WorkItem.Description: Trying to import character from battle net(Sorth on US-Hydraxis) and this error pops up. I have tried using the latest online version, as well as using it offline.
WorkItem.Summary: [LoadCharacter] Unable to import character from Armory/Battle.net

Comments.Message: In that message it says your character was not found on the armory. But since I can load that character on screen we may be looking at the armory being down at that time or something else going on.
Just tried it now and it is giving the same error yet I can load the character on the battle.net website.
I can confirm the same error over the course of the day.
Revceiving the same error on trying to import charaters

Everyone please try the steps on the Troubleshooting page and confirm the issue still exists afterward:
http://rawr.codeplex.com/wikipage?action=Edit&title=Troubleshooting

Sorry, wrong link:
http://rawr.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Troubleshooting
Have tried all applicable options in the link and it is still doing it for me.

Hi.
I try the same on the server "Das Syndikat". It is the same error.
Astry has informed me that Battle.net changed their structure again so our Parsing no longer works. He will be fixing it tomorrow (will, today technically, but not in the next few hours).
I'm receiving the same error message. Is the armory information even online yet?
Getting the same error as well.
So it appears that a web service that does the Armory parsing - is the code somewhere available? I can't work on a fix/patch if the code isn't available. :)

So I spent some time digging into this and it seems the XML from the old armory is still available as XML - when you go to you char sheet http://us.wowarmory.com/character-sheet.xml?r=[Realm]&cn=[Char] in a browser, the XML references a style sheet that contains the redirect, however, looking at the underlying XML it is still the same old armory details. [Blue Post] http://us.battle.net/wow/en/forum/topic/969726977?page=4#70 

There is also no indication that the XML has changed. 

Could we maybe at the very least get what Rawr is expecting to be returned from the web service? I'd like to help out and see if I can recreate and/or help fix whatever this bug is.

We're not using that anymore.
The only thing that needs to happen right now is Astry needs to fix the parsing on our server side. He'll be getting to that as soon as he has a few minutes to sort it out.
I understand that the server side needs to be fixed - I'm only offering to try and assist.
You can find the server code under Rawr.Server in source.
Thx.

Like I said in the earlier comment, mine is not being able to load from armory either. I'm aware that the problem should be fixed soon. But is this problem existing only for few people? It seems like people are posting on this Issue Tracker who are able to successfully load and whatnot, but just having problems with the actual program itself.

The problem exists for everyone. The people that are continuing to work with Rawr and post issues have worked around the issue by either working off a saved XML file or by setting up their toon manually. Setting up your toon manually is a slower process but actually quite easy.
This should be fixed now
